game.title: The Cursed Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the cursed treasure from Dark Forest
game.description: Venture into the dread shadows of Dark Forest, defeat lurking evils & retrieve the cursed treasure.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and 'Sword of the Spirit'

tasks.objective: Locate the entrance of Dark Forest
tasks.description: You must find the entrance of Dark Forest. The clues are placed in the Wizard's study room.
Defend yourself against the feral beasts within the forest.

tasks.objective: Find and retrieve the cursed treasure
tasks.description: The treasure is hidden within the heart of the forest in a cursed shrine.
